sys_script.name: Candidate State Changes

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_dbe2fabb4772a510691e7258946d4323
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_431105_cand_ass_candidate</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_431105_cand_ass_candidate">stateIN50,60^EQ<item display_value="50,60" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="50,60"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Candidate State Changes</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var PENDING_ELIGIBILITY_CHECK = 50; var PENDING_ELIGIBILITY_APPROVAL = 60; var ELIGIBILITY_DONE = 70; var REQUESTED = 'requested'; var NOT_YET_REQUESTED = 'not requested'; var APPROVED = 'approved'; var REJECTED = 'rejected';
if (current.state == PENDING_ELIGIBILITY_CHECK && current.approval == REQUESTED){ current.state = PENDING_ELIGIBILITY_APPROVAL; current.update(); } else if (current.state == PENDING_ELIGIBILITY_APPROVAL && (current.approval == APPROVED || current.approval == REJECTED)){ current.state = ELIGIBILITY_DONE; current.update(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-21 09:37:31</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>dbe2fabb4772a510691e7258946d4323</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Candidate State Changes</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Talent 2" source="x_431105_cand_ass">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Talent 2">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_dbe2fabb4772a510691e7258946d4323</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>nappoma</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-21 09:50:13</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dbe2fabb4772a510691e7258946d4323"/> </record_update>
